    • Method Detail

      • isClosingQuote

        public boolean isClosingQuote(HighlighterIterator iterator,
                              int offset)
        Description copied from interface: QuoteHandler
        Checks whether there is the closing quote or the last one of the set of closing quotes of a string literal at the given offset.

        Upon insertion, this method is called before the quote is actually inserted in the editor in order to check whether it's going to be typed over an existing one closing a string literal and, thus, should be omitted (only the caret position will be adjusted in this case).

        Specified by:
        isClosingQuote in interface QuoteHandler
        Parameters:
        iterator - highlighting iterator at the state corresponding to the offset
        offset - the offset at which the quote is going to be inserted/deleted

      • isOpeningQuote

        public boolean isOpeningQuote(HighlighterIterator iterator,
                              int offset)
        Description copied from interface: QuoteHandler
        Checks whether there is the opening quote or the last one of the set of opening quotes of a string literal at the given offset.
        Specified by:
        isOpeningQuote in interface QuoteHandler
        Parameters:
        iterator - highlighting iterator at the state corresponding to the offset
        offset - the offset at which the quote was inserted

      • hasNonClosedLiteral

        public boolean hasNonClosedLiteral(Editor editor,
                                   HighlighterIterator iterator,
                                   int offset)
        Description copied from interface: QuoteHandler
        Called after the quote has been inserted in the editor to check that it belongs to an empty string literal that has only the opening quote and therefore, can be completed by inserting the respective closing one.

        If both this method and QuoteHandler.isOpeningQuote(HighlighterIterator, int) return true, the respective closing quote will be inserted automatically.

        Specified by:
        hasNonClosedLiteral in interface QuoteHandler
        Parameters:
        editor - an editor instance where the quote was inserted
        iterator - highlighting iterator at the state corresponding to the offset
        offset - the offset at which the quote was inserted
        See Also:
        QuoteHandler.isOpeningQuote(HighlighterIterator, int)
